[i]Note: The MP3 tags are in Greek Phonetics, some tracks with translation in English. I had to edit tracks so if there is an occasional spelling error in Greek words I do apologize. I had to make the choice between using the letter X or H a few times and I went with the H. - Big Papi[/i]

By A Customer
[quote]I first heard parts of this album 10 years ago on TV and didn't even know who Dalaras was. Ever since then I was looking for this album. Now that I got my hands on it I find the songs on this album as amazing as I had found 10 years earlier. Not only is the music beautiful but the voice of Dalaras is just amazing. In a world where new "artists" are a weekly phenomenon, Dalaras's talent as can be witnessed through this album is a reminder that there remains some authentic artists who's presence can still be felt through their music and who's music transcends the recording and provides the listener with true feelings. If you've ever enjoyed latin or mediteranean music and dislike fast-food music then this is for you. I listen to a lot of music and Dalaras and this album in particular rate as #1 on my chart. If it was possible, I would've given it 10 stars.[/quote]
